extendedInfo.description: or any other app.Often you need to change your screen brightness while you are playing a game, watching video, reading email and so on, because your display is very dark.Don't you just hate it when you have to go back to the settings and change your brightness level on the device manually?Now with Easy Brightness Level app, you can easily adjust the screen brightness level on your device on the same time while you are running an application. You donât need to change your position at all!Simply SHAKE your device and the Easy Brightness Level app will appear in front of you. Change your screen's brightness level in real-time, easy and fast without needing to switch your current position.The App Provides Features like:   *Auto function to control the screen brightness   *Quickly adjust to 0%, 25%, 50%, 75%, 100% brightness level   *Manual function with Brightness SliderA better way, like brightness widget that let you control to low, medium and high brightness.Its makes your life so easy. Download it now!!************************************************************************NOTE: AUTO function is only available on the devices that supports this feature.************************************************************************

reviews.title: Plz update it
reviews.comment: Nice app but give such a option whom I directly go to the fix brightness without open menu that how much u want
reviews.author: Muhammad Owais

reviews.title: Nice brightness control
reviews.comment: Only give it 4star as it always stuck 7% lowest. Using Samsung I9000, speedmod kernel. Nice feature using shake method.
reviews.author: Khong Giap Chew

reviews.title: S4
reviews.comment: Very good idea and a very useful app, just 3 things would make this a 5 star app. 1: Shake should adjust the brightness not bring up a menu. 2: Also should be an option to start app when phone starts. 3: Also you should be able to adjust the shake sensitivity. I will give 1 star for each fix. Fix all and get 5 stars. Thanks
reviews.author: Lex Sin

reviews.title: Nope
reviews.comment: Way too many unneeded permissions for what this does. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: B Gil
